Test

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • Test.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to create instances of each task in a Line Balancing Problem
    Author:
    Ulises Martinez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double meanTime
      A double variable that stores the task's mean completion time
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> precedence
      An ArrayList that stores the immediate predecessors of the given task
      private double stdDeviation
      A double variable that stores the task' time's standard deviation
      private int taskNum
      An int variable that stores the task's identifying number

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task()
      An empty class constructor

      A class constructor that initializes taskNum with the given parameter and initializes precedence as an empty array

      A class constructor that initializes the variables taskNum, precedence, meanTime and stdDeviation.
      Task(int taskNum, int[] precedence, double time, double stdDev)
      A class constructor that initializes the variables precedence, meanTime and stdDeviation.

      • getMaxTime

        public double getMaxTime(double probability)
        Method that uses meanTime and stdDeviation to calculate the task's maximum time for a given confidence level
        Parameters:
        probability - - The confidence value used for the normal distribution
        Returns:
        - The task's maximum possible time

      • addPrecedence

        void addPrecedence(int prec)
        A method to add a new predecessor to the given task. Use getTaskNum() to get a task's number
        Parameters:
        prec - - The identifying number of the new predecessor.
